title: Photography NFTs
description: A quick win: understand Photography NFTs.

hook.text: Photographers struggled for decades as stock sites devalued their work. NFTs offered a new path.

buildup.text: Justin Aversano sold a portrait series as NFTs for over $6 million. Each photo was a one-of-one edition.

discovery.text: NFTs let photographers sell directly to collectors, set their own prices, and retain creative control.

twist.text: The boom faded. Most photographers who rushed in during the hype found buyers had moved on to the next trend.

climax.text: A small community of dedicated collectors still supports photography NFTs. Quality outlasted hype.

punchline.text: The hype left. The real collectors stayed.

quiz.question: How did NFTs help photographers?
options: Direct sales to collectors with full creative control
